items.title: Hello World
items.content_html:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

items.title: Code Highlight Style test
items.content_html: Make sure all the code blocks highlighted correctly. All the code samples are come from the demo of https://highlightjs.org

items.title: Gallery Post
items.content_html:
This post contains 4 photos:

  • Widescreen wallpaper
  • Portrait photo
  • Dual widescreen wallpaper
  • Small photo

All photos should be displayed properly.

From Wallbase.cc

items.title: Categories
items.content_html: This post contains 3 categories. Make sure your theme can display all of the categories.

items.title: Elements
items.content_html:
